latest_articles.title: Israeli media cite official accepting Hamas figure of 70,000 war dead
latest_articles.summary: Israel has previously cast doubt on figures from the Hamas-run health ministry, which the UN considers reliable.

latest_articles.title: Apple acquires Israeli startup Q.ai
latest_articles.summary: Q.ai was led by Aviad Maizels, who previously sold a startup called PrimeSense to Apple in 2013.

latest_articles.title: 'I can breathe again' says Israeli hostage held for nearly 500 days in Gaza
latest_articles.summary: In his first international interview, Sasha Troufanov tells the BBC how he thought he would die in captivity after he was taken hostage on 7 October 2023.

latest_articles.title: Israel Parliament Approves 2026 Budget Draft, Averts Snap Election For Now
latest_articles.summary: Israel's parliament gave initial approval to the 2026 state budget draft on Thursday, handing Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu a temporary political reprieve by averting the immediate prospect of an early election.

latest_articles.title: Netanyahu Vows to Cut Israel’s Reliance on U.S. Military Aid
latest_articles.summary: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu blamed some soldiers’ deaths in the Gaza war on a lack of ammunition caused by a pause in American weapon deliveries during President Biden’s term.

latest_articles.title: Why Israeli PM Benjamin Netanyahu Keeps His Phone Camera Taped
latest_articles.summary: Israel has strict rules about using certain smartphones.

latest_articles.title: Thursday briefing: Will Keir Starmer’s cautious China gamble pay off?
latest_articles.summary: In today’s newsletter: With China now central to the world’s green tech​ and economic future, the UK faces a ​s​eries of strategic ​discussions it can no longer postponeGood morning. The Starmer has landed.Yesterday, Kei…

latest_articles.title: Board of Peace Set to Hand Trump Sweeping Powers Over Gaza
latest_articles.summary: A draft resolution revealed some of the plans for the new international body, which met for the first time last week amid criticism from some U.S. allies.

latest_articles.title: Israel Recovers Body of Ran Gvili From Gaza, Closing a Chapter
latest_articles.summary: The recovery of Master Sgt. Ran Gvili’s body paves the way for the next stage of the Gaza cease-fire plan, though the path forward is unclear.

latest_articles.title: Israel Says It Will Reopen Gaza-Egypt Border Crossing in Days
latest_articles.summary: The Rafah crossing will open at the end of Israel’s search for the remains of the last captive in Gaza.
